channel.title: How do i make NPC so when you trade them you get a shop window
channel.description: omfg please help me its been like over a weeK!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: How do i make NPC so when you trade them you get a shop window
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

now, in autospawn, making a new npc at the bottom… may make the npc… but it doeant make the npc WORK

so, take an existing npc in Autospawn, erase the ID and Coords and replace with the one you want,

NOW, go to Shops, get the Shop number, and now heres client.java

serch for something like

WanneShop WanneShop

NOW under it or above it where ever you want Put this

else if (NPCID == NPC ID) { // DESCRIPTION PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = SHOP NUMBER; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make NPC so when you trade them you get a shop window
